name: McKinley, Appellant, v. Southern Fulton School District
name_abbreviation: McKinley v. Southern Fulton School District

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
parties: McKinley, Appellant, v. Southern Fulton School District.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Each party to pay own costs.
Mr. Justice Cohen dissents.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Caram J. Abood, with him Richard J. Green, Jr. and Merrill W. Kerlin, for appellants.
Robert D. Myers, with him Albert Foster, Frank A. Sinon, and Rhoads, Sinon & Reader, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
McKinley, Appellant, v. Southern Fulton School District.
Argued May 1, 1964.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Caram J. Abood, with him Richard J. Green, Jr. and Merrill W. Kerlin, for appellants.
Robert D. Myers, with him Albert Foster, Frank A. Sinon, and Rhoads, Sinon & Reader, for appellee.
July 1, 1964:
